a.detail: Rusting iron spikes line the walls

details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a planar gate. It was eventually abandoned due to plague, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

settings.name: The Forsaken Warrens of Illfang the Kobold Lord

wandering_monsters.1: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.2: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.3: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.4: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.5: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.6: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, wandering senselessly
